title: Windows 7 SP1U AIO 11in1 Aug 2013 IE11 NET451 VC++ DirectX
description:
Windows 7 SP1U AIO 11in1 x86 x64 En-US integrated updates until August 2013, IE11 Preview, .NET Framework 4.5.1 Preview, Visual C++ Redist 2005-2012 AIO x86 x64 with updates, DirectX Redist June 2010.

Also integrated 3rd party driver. Driver-driver added using dism after add-package:
AMD HDC Driver 5.2.2.0179
Asmedia USB3 Driver v1.16.4.0
Realtek HD Audio Driver 6.0.1.6971 - HDXCR Driver for PC
Realtek LAN Driver 7.073.0618.2013
SMBus AMD v5.12.0.0015

Runtime software added inside Scripts folder: 
Slim .NET Framework 4.5.1 Preview by ricktendo at wincert forum
Visual C++ Redist 2005-2012 AIO with updates by ricktendo at wincert forum
DirectX Redist June 2010
(these runtimes is for playing game, and also for Visio app)


iso name: 7SP1AIO_Aug2013.iso
iso size: 4.99GB
MD5: 6ca0213ab6ac14ee239c1dadde4f0b02
SHA-1: 7bb715e18d46e4cb3a5ce47fa6b89b4c39519f1e
CRC-32: 5b0a5fcc


Sources for making this AIO:

32-bit:
X17-59463.iso - Windows 7 Ultimate SP1U x86 English by Digital River
en_windows_7_enterprise_with_sp1_x86_dvd_u_677710.iso - Windows 7 Enterprise SP1U x86 by Digital River

64-bit:
X17-59465.iso - Windows 7 Ultimate SP1U x64 English by Digital River
en_windows_7_enterprise_with_sp1_x64_dvd_u_677651.iso - Windows 7 Enterprise SP1U x64 by Digital River


Tools i've used:
dism for integrate updates and drivers into wim
imageX for export image with command /export compress maximum
oscdimg for making iso


OS Index (Image Name & Image Decription, Display Name & Display Description):
index 1: Windows 7 Starter SP1U 32-bit
index 2: Windows 7 Home Basic SP1U 32-bit
index 3: Windows 7 Home Premium SP1U 32-bit
index 4: Windows 7 Professional SP1U 32-bit
index 5: Windows 7 Ultimate SP1U 32-bit
index 6: Windows 7 Enterprise SP1U 32-bit
index 7: Windows 7 Home Basic SP1U 64-bit
index 8: Windows 7 Home Premium SP1U 64-bit
index 9: Windows 7 Professional SP1U 64-bit
index 10: Windows 7 Ultimate SP1U 64-bit
index 11: Windows 7 Enterprise SP1U 64-bit


Pre-activated:
For Non Enterprise Edition using Windows Loader 2.2.1 by Daz and it included inside Scripts folder.
For Enterprise Edition using KMS OEM Folder 2.4.5 v1 by murphy78 and it included inside Scripts folder and WinDir (KMSServerService folder inside Windows folder).
